text:
This works for me once I set URIEncoding to UTF-8 on the connector.

A few words of caution. Clients, at least on Windows, don't seem to handle this very well. For example, drag and drop is fine, deleting fails. Testing via telnet with know good input showed that this does work.

If you need help getting your configuration to a point where this works correctly, please ask on the users list.
